title: Draconian POV: Volume 1
description: A set of two flash-fiction tales from the dragons' point of view.In "the Clutch", a wingless copper dragon tries to protect her clutch of eggs from a dragon slayer.In "Shoreline", a huge beach dragon hunts whalers for killing his mate. MediumThis is a Gryphon Scribes book.
author: Mai Keyes
